name: Cryptic (itch) (ManicEmu)
description:
Howdy folks! First upload here.

This is a project I put together in a few days, as I'm trying to test different ideas and see how they play and feel. That being said, this is no where near being finished, and is just about 5-10 minutes of gameplay, if that. I'm currently catching up on a few things, but I'm going to be replacing all the art assets in the game with ones I've made in the coming weeks.

Also, I apologize for the sound effects, couldn't quite control the volume proper.

Feel free to give it a shot and tell me what you think.
